x_symbol.description: Enable dragging for the element. If fnDrag is not provided then this code will provide basic dragging. If fnDrag is provided then it must implement the dragging.

par.name: ele
par.note: id string or element object reference.

par.name: fnDragStart
par.note: Function - will be called on mousedown on ele. fnDragStart(ele, mouseX, mouseY, xEventObj)

par.name: fnDrag
par.note: Function - will be called on each mousemove during dragging. fnDrag(ele, mouseDX, mouseDY, xEventObj)

par.name: fnDragEnd
par.note: Function - will be called on mouseup on ele. fnDragEnd(ele, mouseX, mouseY, xEventObj)

demo.note: A test page for xDragInFence, xEnableDrag and xEnableDrop.
